issue.title: [MATLAB] Add examples/ directory to demonstrate workflows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12350](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12350). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create an examples/ directory under matlab/ that contains MATLAB scripts to demonstrate workflows enabled by the MATLAB Interface for Apache Arrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12350?focusedCommentId=17565815) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
